ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] A strange place to climb (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Khelan - I can honestly say that I ve been in the exact same spot ;)  As a Guide (on TM), I used the Guide Levitate and Spirit of Norrath to do exactly
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:44 PM 10/30/00 -0500, you wrote:
>Well, I was slightly bored on Saturday, so I decided to climb the statue
>of Firiona Vie in FV. Anything that tall is just meant to be climbed
>:). I don't think it would be possible to anyone not a Bard, but it may
>be possible. Visit http://www.clandlc.com/Firiona/ for screenshots and a
>description of how I did it.
>
>Hope a few of you try it yourself, it's a blast and a great view : )


Khelan - I can honestly say that I've been in the exact same spot ;) As a
Guide (on TM), I used the Guide Levitate and Spirit of Norrath to do
exactly what you just described. Very entertaining ;) My favourite
Levitate and Fall spot, however, is the gigantic wizard spires in the
Dreadlands. For sheer entertainment value once, I jumped off the spires,
sat and camped while slowly drifting downwards. When I logged in next, I
was still a long way up ;)

Talies the Wanderer
